ComicInfo.Summary:
Within the ancient city of Thurd, Dejah Thoris finds what she’s looking for with the unlikely help of the green Martian. And a long-forgotten secret of Ephysium comes to light…
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Mike McKone | 1 | B | Cover B | Diego Galindo | 2 | C | Cover C | Sergio Davila & Ivan Nunes | 3 | D/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Mike McKone | 4 | E/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Sergio Davila | 5 |
